alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 4:56PM CDT until March 21 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Comanche, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Duncan, Marlow, Waurika, Comanche, Bray, Addington, Waurika Lake, Corum and Empire City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
